mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Proudman, Robert
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Patterson, Pasaic Co., New Jersey [Paterson, Passaic County, New Jersey]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Proudman, Robert Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of left leg 2 1/2 inches below the knee on external side. Nature of Wound: Fragment of shell. Treatment: Simple dressings. Creosote and sweet oil. Simple curate. Result: Returned to duty.
